sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO estimate ( unq , type , email , name , phone , person , money , ptime , floc , sdate , edate , schange , airline , stay , stayname , req , rdate , inestimateagree , title , userid , city , passage , reply ) VALUES ( SEQ_estimate_unq.nextval , 'A' , 'B' , 'C' , 'D' , '1' , '2' , 'F' , 'G' , 'H' , 'I' , 'J' , 'K' , 'L' , 'M' , 'N' , sysdate , 'O' , '$title$' , 'Q' , 'R' , 'S' , 'T' )
